channel.title: Space technology of the Day

item.title: Soon (musical)
item.description: Soon is a rock opera with music by Joseph M. Kookoolis and Scott Fagan, lyrics by Fagan, and a book by Scott Fagan and Joe Kookoolis and Robert Greenwald. It is based on a story by Fagan and Kookoolis. The story is about a group of young musicians who achieve success in New York City, but pay the price. It was an attack on the record industry, which apparently caused Fagan and Kookoolis to be blacklisted.
